name: Cassava Network
intro: Africa’s crypto infrastructure for all online residents
introduce:
Cassava Network is backed by a multi-function app and wallet, which allows users to explore rewards, manage assets, trade NFTs, perform in-app swaps, access staking pools, engage with DeFi protocols and interact with Web3 platforms through the in-wallet browser.
Cassava is also building an ID system that leverages the data made available to the platform through partner integrations. The user’s behavior on different content platforms, such as news, music, video and games, will be recorded and even gamified through Cassava On-Chain Achievement Tokens (OATs).
